CmdLine: wget -q -O moskito.tgz http://www.moskito.org/download/moskito-$MOSKITO_VERSION.tgz     && tar zxf moskito.tgz     && rm -rf $CATALINA_HOME/webapps/*     && mv moskito/moskito-control/webapps/moskito-control.war $CATALINA_HOME/webapps/ROOT.war     && rm -rf moksito.tgz moskito/
Commands.Name: run
